description:
Erection of nine storey plus basement building to provide 21,464sq.m. office use with 28 basement car parking spaces. 

 APPLICANTS' PLAN NOS.:  724/01/100, 101, 102, 103, 104, 105,                         106, 400, 724/10/100, 724/02/102,                         105, 107, 109, 113, 100, 114, 115,                         116, 117, 118, 119, 120, 121 and                         Planning Supporting Statement.
decision_conditions:
The London borough of Islington would like to object to the proposal scheme for the following reasons. 

 REASON; The proposal by reason of its height and scale in relation with the buildings on City Road would be a detrimental and obtrusive feature in the locality and as such would not preserve the character or appearance of the Moorfields Conservation Area.
